title: Champion Relatives
body:
{{champion:267}} If a new champion that came into the game was based off of another character in the sense of a relative/family member, who would it be?

I'd like to see (and hopefully will see) more of the Marai, perhaps in the form of Nami's family.

Maybe a male Marai mid champion, or jungle champion? So many cool things.

How about you GD? Wanna meet any champions families?

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=702724&d=1370780440
*picture is from a champion concept named "Kree" 
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3532811
